hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Huge Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Like Like Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to the #Carpenters' tent#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that something wonderful happens when playing the Song of Storms after planting a magic bean.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Zelda's Lullaby#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #1# major item.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Zelda's Lullaby#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Forest Temple#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Slingshot#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Claim Check#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Water Switch Room

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Red Potion Bottle# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Theater

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Goron Tunic# and #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Deku Shield#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
